findings.title: No tests were provided.
findings.description: The audit did not receive any test cases to verify the correctness of the smart contract's functionality.

findings.title: Missing lookup table using for index
Missing event for changing whiteList, receiveFun, implAddress, _baseHeroURI, operator, configs, marketFeeInBps, summonersArenaHeroes
findings.description: The contract does not emit events when critical values such as whiteList, receiveFun, implAddress, _baseHeroURI, operator, configs, marketFeeInBps, and summonersArenaHeroes are changed.
